author: Alex Richards
title: Carlo Ancelotti warns Manchester City "there is no way" Joshua Kimmich will leave this summer
text:
Sport Carlo Ancelotti warns Manchester City "there is no way" Joshua Kimmich will leave this summer The Italian has been criticised for his use of the Germany star, who himself has suggested his own unhappiness Share Bayern will not be selling Kimmich any time soon (Photo: 2016 Getty Images) Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Carlo Ancelotti has told Manchester City that they have “no chance” of signing Joshua Kimmich this summer. 
Kimmich recently expressed his unhappiness at a lack of starting opportunities this season, having played just 42 minutes in Bayern’s last five games and completed 90 minutes only twice - in all competitions - since October 26. 
City boss Pep Guardiola had been hoping to use that to persuade the player - whom he once declared has “got absolutely everything” to be a world star - to become part of his City overhaul this summer. 
However, the German international is highly-rated in Bavaria and seen as a future club captain, the long-term heir to Philipp Lahm, who retires this summer. 
Now Ancelotti has seen fit to lay bare that Kimmich is very much part of his plans at the Allianz Arena. Guardiola had been keen on a Kimmich reunion (Photo: Getty) Ancelotti will make Kimmich his first-choice right-back next term (Photo: REUTERS) 
Asked about a potential move away, Ancelotti stated: "There is no way Joshua [Kimmich] will leave in the summer. way!” 
The Italian also hinted that Bayern will be taking up their option on Kingsley Coman, the on-loan French international who is another Guardiola target. Coman will also be staying put (Photo: REUTERS) 
Bayern paid €8million to take the Juventus starlet on loan in 2015, but after an outstanding debut season he has struggled with injuries this term. 
A recent double in the rout of Hamburg showcased his talent however, and when asked about his future, Ancelotti stated, matter-of-factly: “Kingsley Coman will stay too”. Like us on Facebook
